description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of permutations of {1,2,...,n} having k double descents and initial descents (n>=0; 0<=k<=max(0,n-1)) [we say that i is a doubledescent of a permutation p if p(i) > p(i+1) > p(i+2); we say that a permutation p has an initial descent if p(1) > p(2)].
